page.title: 17Social Amenities-Ellastone 2
page.content: In the village of Ellastone there are Dancing classes and Badminton at the village hall. A dance is held once a month and there is a village pub. It was agreed that they are more things than 10 years ago. The new things being planned are a bowling green,a tennis court and a new Car Park. We asked if there were any clubs that children could join.There was a Sunday school,which only 10 children belong. We were told that the older richer people who were moving into the village didn't tend to join in the local events, except the retired farmers. Certainly people who came from cities didn't appear to be very interested in village activities.
